IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO IMPROVE THE HEALTH AND WELL-BEING OF THE PEOPLE OF DETROIT BY INVESTING IN ORGANIZATIONS DEDICATED TO SERVING THE NEEDS OF THE COMMUNITY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROMOTE AND SUPPORT HEALTHCARE WITHIN THE DETROIT MARKET, INCLUDING:I. ESTABLISHING PROGRAMS TO IMPROVE THE HEALTH AND LIVES OF PEOPLELIVING IN HIGH-NEED AREAS;II. PROVIDING CARE MANAGEMENT FOR, ADDRESSING SOCIAL HEALTH DETRIMENTSOF, AND SOLVING TRANSPORTATION ISSUES FOR TRANSFERRED AND VULNERABLEPOPULATIONS;III. DEVELOPING PROGRAMS FOR THE EDUCATION OF PREGNANT WOMEN WITHRESPECT TO THE IMPORTANCE OF PRENATAL AND PREVENTATIVE CARE;IV. ESTABLISHING PROGRAMS RELATED TO HEALTHY EATING AND WELLNESS FORTRANSFERRED AND VULNERABLE POPULATIONS; ANDV. ASSISTING WITH THE NAVIGATION OF THE VARIOUS ASPECTS OF MEDICAID.
IRS990.Desc: CONTRIBUTING TO PROGRAMS THAT IMPROVE THE LIVES OF PEOPLE LIVING IN HIGH-NEED AREAS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: CONTRIBUTING TO PROGRAMS RELATED TO HEALTHY EATING AND WELLNESS FOR VULNERABLE POPULATIONS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: CONTRIBUTING TO PROGRAMS THAT PROVIDE ACCESS TO CARE AND WELLNESS.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: EDUCATION OF PREGNANT WOMEN WITH RESPECT TO PRENATAL AND PREVENTATIVE CARE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: POTENTIAL GRANTEE ORGANIZATIONS ARE CAREFULLY VETTED AND DUE DILIGENCE IS CONDUCTED WITH RESPECT TO THE POTENTIAL GRANTEE'S IRS DETERMINATION, HISTORY AND THE SCOPE/PURPOSE OF THE PROJECT TO BE FUNDED. PRIOR TO PAYMENT OF THE GRANT, A GRANT AGREEMENT IS SIGNED. SITE VISITS, SOCIAL MEDIA MONITORING AND OTHER CHECK-INS WITH GRANTEES OCCUR AS DEEMED NECESSARY THROUGHOUT THE PERIOD OF THE GRANT. REPORTS ARE REQUIRED FOR AWARDED GRANTS UPON THEIR CONCLUSION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CERTAIN MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS HAVE A BUSINESS RELATIONSHIP THROUGH MANAGEMENT AT PRIORITY HEALTH.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE TAX RETURN IS REVIEWED BY FINANCE LEADERSHIP AT PRIORITY HEALTH, INCLUDING THE FINANCE MANAGER AND SVP OF FINANCE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IN THEIR CAPACITY AS OFFICERS OR MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF TOTAL HEALTH CARE FOUNDATION, OFFICERS AND DIRECTORS MUST ACT AT ALL TIMES IN THE BEST INTERESTS OF THE FOUNDATION. THE PURPOSE OF THIS POLICY IS TO HELP INFORM THE OFFICERS AND BOARD OF DIRECTORS ABOUT WHAT CONSTITUTES A CONFLICT OF INTEREST, ASSIST THE BOARD IN IDENTIFYING AND DISCLOSING ACTUAL AND POTENTIAL CONFLICTS, AND HELP ENSURE THE AVOIDANCE OF CONFLICTS OF INTEREST WHERE NECESSARY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AN INDEPENDENT MARKET STUDY WAS DONE IN 2021. THE STUDY VALIDATED THAT THE BOARD STIPENDS PAID ARE REASONABLE AND WITHIN THE RANGE OF BOARD STIPENDS PAID BY SIMILAR ORGANIZATIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ORGANIZATIONAL DOCUMENTS AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
